comment._content: She exudes confidence in a time when American women were still expected to be subservient.

comment.author: 83082271@N00
comment._content: Subservient!? Ha! You should have known my aunts and grandmothers (all born in 1880s - early 1900s). NO ONE gave them any guff!

comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content:
ELIZABETH GREGORY WED IN EAST ORANGE; Becomes the Bride of Sydney W. Fraser in Chapel Ceremony

August 30, 1938, Tuesday

Miss Elizabeth H. Gregory, daughter of Mrs. Frank Keresey of High Hill Beach, L. I., was married here today to Sydney W. Fraser of this city in the chapel of the Munn Avenue Presbyterian Church by the Rev. Robert Brewster Beattie.
